creditline: Gift of The Frederick and Margaret L. Weyerhaeuser Foundation
description: Standing female with bare feet, light purple hat; a lamb lays at her feet on proper right side; she carries a basket of flowers on a bent proper left arm and is holding a flower in her other hand.
markings: Blue crossed swords, impressed \'22\' and \'93\', and \'11\' in red paint under base.
object_name: Woman with basket of flowers figure
title: Woman with basket of flowers figure
